meanings.sent1: The flowers bloomed unbidden in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The laughter was unbidden and contagious.
meanings.sent3: The unbidden rain shower caught us off guard during the picnic.
meanings.sent4: Her unbidden smile lit up the room like sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The unbidden idea popped into his head out of nowhere.

meanings.sent1: An unbidden guest arrived at the party.
meanings.sent2: The unbidden package showed up on the doorstep.
meanings.sent3: The unbidden visitor brought a surprise gift.
meanings.sent4: Her unbidden presence added a touch of mystery to the event.
meanings.sent5: The unbidden noise startled the sleeping cat.
